ibis.ipl.server
Interface ServerInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
Server, ServerConnection
public interface ServerInterface

Interface to the Ibis server. This can be both locally to the actual server object, or remotely through a ServerConnection.

WARNING: This is an Experimental feature of the IPL. It may not function correctly, future releases of the IPL may have a revised API for this feature, or it may be removed completely.

end

void end(long timeout)
         throws IOException
Stops all services. May wait until the services are idle.

Parameters:
timeout - timeout for ending all services in milliseconds. 0 == wait forever, -1 == not wait.
Throws:
IOException
